reviewText: This is a very hectic, on-rails shooter. I was expecting more freeform nagivation, but it's just swarms of different ships with different types of firepower coming from the right as you progress from the left. I should've noticed the shoot-em-up arcade" part in the description.\n\nYou can pick up power-ups that will change your cannons to use fireballs
voteText: fires in different directions and at different distances. Since it is on rails
helpfulPercent: it's very important to dodge and fire as fast as you can. If you're lucky
votesHelpful: you'll pick up repair items and extra lives.\n\nIt's quite a straightforward arcade shooter
votesTotal: except it's boats instead of spaceships or airplanes. This isn't my usual type of game
votesFunny: but if you like shooters where you are constantly moving forward
commentsCount: you only can move Up/Down/Left/Right within your current frame
column16: and you just shoot like crazy with unlimited ammo while avoiding getting blitzed by an abnormal number of enemy ships... then this might be for you. It's only $0.99
column17:
so why not?
